I wanted something simple and this nailed it. I really really like how the latch works, you slip the bar into the other side's hoop, and you take it off the same way. I hate those little hook ones with the tiny levers. Besides that, it's got a good weight, a nice color, and it's not too long but not too short. Not quite a choker, not quite a necklace, it works well if you're wearing a longer necklace or something, that's what I do.

评论概述: Has A Metal Smell But Very Sturdy Necklace
评论详情: 6.20.23 I received this item pretty quickly. Ordered it over the weekend and received it in a day or 2 after. It was packaged well, bubbled wrapped inside a bubble wrap package. Inside was the necklace with the paper that was included. Photos shown for the paper and necklace quality. I'm only worried about when the body oils mix in it, like when my son sweats or wears it so much it will start having a strong medal smell, along with a discolored look.. we will see. For now the looks & quality feel is a 8 out of 10. Feels very sturdy & strong. The color is silver and it looks coated well on the links that attached together. It's more of a question now of how long it will take to wear before the metal smell gets worse or the shade of the chain starts to discolor. I will keep posted if any changes happen. This review is more of my 1st impression on the necklace from overall quality, to shipment packaging and how it was received.
It's exactly what I was looking for in terms of look and length. I wear it over sweaters and long sleeves - it's long enough for that and looks great.
i like this chain, it's comfortable to wear and very easy to put on. unsure if it will get discolored though
Was not long enough to fit an adult as a necklace but made an ok bracelet
